description: This file defines the PaymentController class in a Laravel application, handling API endpoints for managing payment gateways, including listing, retrieving, adding, updating, and deleting payment gateway records.

classes.name: PaymentController
classes.description: Controller class managing API endpoints for payment gateway operations in a Laravel application.

methods.name: getPaymentGateways
methods.description: Handles request to retrieve list of payment gateways.

methods.name: getPaymentGateway
methods.description: Handles request to retrieve a specific payment gateway by ID.

methods.name: addPaymentGateway
methods.description: Handles request to add a new payment gateway, including validation.

methods.name: updatePaymentGateway
methods.description: Handles request to update an existing payment gateway, including validation.

methods.name: removePaymentGateway
